sentences.en: Depression in the twilight years (= the last years of your life ) is usually related to illness.
sentences.cn: 晚年的精神抑郁通常与疾病有关。

sentences.en: Homer lived in the twilight of history.
sentences.cn: 荷马(希腊诗人)生于历史上遥远的时代.

sentences.en: I am getting old. I am in the twilight of my life.
sentences.cn: 我老了，到了生命的暮年。

sentences.en: It was hard to see him clearly in the twilight .
sentences.cn: 在朦胧的暮色中很难看清他。

sentences.en: Now both men are in the twilight of their careers.
sentences.cn: 现在两人的事业都到了没落期。

sentences.en: romantic walks along the beach at twilight
sentences.cn: 黄昏时分浪漫的海边漫步

sentences.en: She enters the wood , where it is already twilight.
sentences.cn: 她走进森林, 森林里已经是一片朦胧.

sentences.en: The cold winter night had fallen, snuffing out the brief twilight.
sentences.cn: 寒冷的冬夜已经降临, 把黄昏时短暂的暮色也给吞没了.

sentences.en: The twilight had turned to a deep blackness.
sentences.cn: 暮色渐浓，变成了漆黑一片。

sentences.en: There was a sound of thrushes calling in the dark blue twilight.
sentences.cn: 深蓝色的暮夜中有?0鸟在鸣叫.

sentences.en: They fell into that twilight zone between military personnel and civilian employees.
sentences.cn: 他们成了军队人员与平民雇员之间身份界定不清的人。

sentences.en: They returned at twilight, and set off for one of the promenade bars.
sentences.cn: 他们黄昏时分回来，然后去了一家步行街酒吧。
夕阳的光辉融于黑暗中.

sentences.en: Twilight was falling as he turned homeward.
sentences.cn: 他转身往家走时,已是黄昏时分.

sentences.en: Twilight was sweet with the smell of lilac and freshly turned earth.
sentences.cn: 薄暮充满紫丁香和新翻耕的泥土的香味.

sentences.en: Veiled in the twilight mists, the garden had an air of mystery.
sentences.cn: 满园子都披着黄昏的面纱, 更加上一层神秘的颜色.

sentences.en: You'll most likely see these animals at twilight.
sentences.cn: 黄昏时分你很可能会看到这些动物.

words.tran_cn: 朦胧的,模糊的,阴暗的,阴郁的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 城市贫穷地区；界限分明的两者之间的模糊状态

trans.tran_cn: 奇妙神秘的，虚幻的，朦眬的，界限模糊的
黄昏，暮光，最后阶段，衰落时期
trans.tran_en: the time when day is just starting to become night
